content.text:
# Young Social Democrats (Czech Republic)

| international  = International Union of Socialist Youth (IUSY)
| regional1_type = European
| regional1_name = Young European Socialists (YES)
| website        = https://www.mladi.cz/
}}
The Young Social Democrats (, MSD) is a social-democratic youth organisation in Czech Republic. While not part of the Social Democracy (SOCDEM), there is a close relationship between both parties.
Historically it builds on legacy of Czechoslovak Social Democratic Youth.
References
External links
*[https://mladi.cz/ Official Website]
